tripleplay.ui
Class MenuHost.Pop

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.ui.Layout.Constraint
      tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop
Enclosing class:
MenuHost
public static class MenuHost.Pop
extends Layout.Constraint

An event type for triggering a menu popup. Also acts as a menu constraint so the integrated host layout can make sure the whole menu is on screen and near to the triggering event position or element.

Field Summary

Field Detail

trigger

public final Element<?> trigger
The element that triggered the popup. position is relative to this.

menu

public final Menu menu
The menu to show.

position

public pythagoras.f.IPoint position
The position where the menu should pop up, e.g. a touch event position. Relative to trigger.

bounds

public pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds
The bounds to confine the menu, in screen coordinates; usually the whole screen.

Constructor Detail

MenuHost.Pop

public MenuHost.Pop(Element<?> trigger,
                    Menu menu)
Creates a new event and initializes trigger and menu.

Method Detail

relayEvents

public MenuHost.Pop relayEvents(playn.core.Layer layer)
Causes the menu to handle further events on the given layer. This is usually the layer handling a pointer start that caused the popup. A listener will be added to the layer and the menu notified of pointer drag and end events.

atEventPos

public MenuHost.Pop atEventPos(playn.core.Events.Position pos)
Positions the menu popup at the given positional event.

atScreenPos

public MenuHost.Pop atScreenPos(float x,
                                float y)
Positions the menu popup at the given screen position.

atLayerX

public MenuHost.Pop atLayerX(playn.core.Layer layer,
                             float x)
Positions the menu horizontally relative to the given layer, with an offset. The vertical position remains unchanged.

atLayerY

public MenuHost.Pop atLayerY(playn.core.Layer layer,
                             float y)
Positions the menu vertically relative to the given layer, with an offset. The horizontal position remains unchanged.

toLeft

public MenuHost.Pop toLeft(float x)
Positions the menu horizontally relative to the left edge of the trigger.

toRight

public MenuHost.Pop toRight(float x)
Positions the menu horizontally relative to the right edge of the trigger.

toTop

public MenuHost.Pop toTop(float y)
Positions the menu vertically relative to the top edge of the trigger.

toBottom

public MenuHost.Pop toBottom(float y)
Positions the menu vertically relative to the bottom edge of the trigger.

retainMenu

public MenuHost.Pop retainMenu()
Flags this Pop event so that the menu will not be destroyed automatically when it is deactivated. Returns this instance for chaining.

inScreenArea

public MenuHost.Pop inScreenArea(pythagoras.f.IRectangle area)
Optionally confines the menu area to the given screen area. By default the menu is confined by the size of the application (see Graphics).

inElement

public MenuHost.Pop inElement(Element<?> elem)
Optionally confines the menu area to the given element. By default the menu is confined by the size of the application area (see Graphics).
